title: Sunmilk logo childlike script
content:
Anybody know if this logo was based on a font? And, do you know who may have designed the packaging. Its kind of nice. I wish I designed it. Thanks.

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [sunmilk.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20110430161223/http:/typophile.com/files/sunmilk.jpg) | 343.75 KB |
author: packagingdesign

comments.content: Very cute. Reminds me of [MeMimas](http://web.archive.org/web/20110430161223/http:/www.fontshop.com/index.cfm?fuseaction=catalog.fontdetail&displayfontid=TO.6104.0.3&attributes.sampleSize=48&sampleText=About+SunMilk&sampleSize=48) or [Handsome](http://web.archive.org/web/20110430161223/http:/www.fontshop.com/index.cfm?fuseaction=catalog.fontdetail&displayfontid=NS.120661.0.2&attributes.sampleSize=48&sampleText=About+SunMilk&sampleSize=48).
